mapper.select: select * from zipcode2013 where dong like #{dong}
select count(userid) cnt from member2 where userid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into member2 (name, jumin1, jumin2, userid, passwd, zipcode,addr1, addr2, email, phone) values (#{name}, #{jumin1}, #{jumin2}, #{userid}, #{passwd}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email}, #{phone})
